required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A PD/Safety Study of RDEA3170 in Combination With Febuxostat for Treating Gout or Asymptomatic Hyperuricemia Patients
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 2a, Randomized, Open-Label, Single-Site Study to Evaluate the Pharmacodynamic Effects and Safety of RDEA3170 Administered in Combination With Febuxostat Compared to RDEA3170 Administered Alone and Febuxostat Administered Alone, Respectively in Japanese Adult Male Subjects With Gout or Asymptomatic Hyperuricemia

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to explore the pharmacodynamics (PD), pharmacokinetics (PK), safety, and tolerability of multiple doses of RDEA3170 administered in combination with febuxostat compared to RDEA3170 administered alone and febuxostat administered alone in Japanese adult male subjects with gout or asymptomatic hyperuricemia.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in Serum uric acid level
primary_outcome.time_frame: baseline and day 7 on each treatment
primary_outcome.description: % change per treatment will be compared.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in Urinary excretion of uric acid
primary_outcome.time_frame: baseline and day 7 on each treatment
primary_outcome.description: Timed urinary uric acid excretion per treatment will be compared

primary_outcome.time_frame: baseline and day 7 on each treatment
primary_outcome.description: Renal clearance of uric acid will be calculated.

primary_outcome.time_frame: baseline and day 7 on each treatment
primary_outcome.description: Fractional excretion and renal clearance of uric acid will be calculated.

secondary_outcome.description: To assess multiple-dose PK of RDEA3170 and febuxostat alone or in combination treatment.
To assess multiple-dose PK of RDEA3170 and febuxostat alone or in combination treatment.
To assess multiple-dose PK of RDEA3170 and febuxostat alone or in combination treatment.
To assess multiple-dose PK of RDEA3170 and febuxostat alone or in combination treatment.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 and Day 7 on each treatment
secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety and tolerability of febuxostat alone, RDEA3170 alone and RDEA3170 administered in combination of febuxostat and febuxostat in combination of RDEA3170

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in hematology, serum chemistry, coagulation, electrocardiogram and urinalysis parameters
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 and Day 8 on each treatment
secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety and tolerability of febuxostat alone, RDEA3170 alone and RDEA3170 administered in combination of febuxostat and febuxostat in combination of RDEA3170

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in vital signs and physical examination findings
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 and Day 8 on each treatment
secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety and tolerability of febuxostat alone, RDEA3170 alone and RDEA3170 administered in combination of febuxostat and febuxostat in combination of RDEA3170

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 42 of the study as follow up
secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety and tolerability of febuxostat alone, RDEA3170 alone and RDEA3170 administered in combination of febuxostat and febuxostat in combination of RDEA3170

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in hematology, serum chemistry, coagulation, electrocardiogram and urinalysis parameters
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 42 of the study as follow up
secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety and tolerability of febuxostat alone, RDEA3170 alone and RDEA3170 administered in combination of febuxostat and febuxostat in combination of RDEA3170

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 42 of the study as follow up
secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety and tolerability of febuxostat alone, RDEA3170 alone and RDEA3170 administered in combination of febuxostat and febuxostat in combination of RDEA3170

other_outcome.time_frame: baseline and day 7 on each treatment
other_outcome.description: To evaluate the relationship between the doses of uralyt and urinary pH under the administration of RDEA3170.

other_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 of the study as randomization
other_outcome.description: To collect and store deoxyribonucleic acid (DNA) for future exploratory research.

other_outcome.measure: Change in Serum uric acid level
other_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and day 7 on each treatment for cohort 6
other_outcome.description: % change per treatment will be compared.

other_outcome.measure: Change in Urinary excretion of uric acid
other_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and day 7 on each treatment for cohort 6
other_outcome.description: Timed urinary uric acid excretion per treatment will be compared.

other_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and day 7 on each treatment for cohort 6

other_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and day 7 on each treatment for cohort 6
other_outcome.description: Fractional excretion and renal clearance of uric acid will be calculated.

arm_group.description: The half of patients randomized to this cohort will be dosed in the order of Febuxostat 10mg, RDEA3170 2.5 mg + Febuxostat 10mg, RDEA3170 2.5 mg + Febuxostat 20mg, and Febuxostat 20mg. The other half will be dosed in the reverse order.

The half of patients randomized to this cohort will be dosed in the order of Febuxostat 10mg, RDEA3170 5 mg + Febuxostat 10mg, RDEA3170 5 mg + Febuxostat 20mg, and Febuxostat 20mg. The other half will be dosed in the reverse order.

The half of patients randomized to this cohort will be dosed in the order of Febuxostat 20mg, RDEA3170 5 mg + Febuxostat 20mg, RDEA3170 5 mg + Febuxostat 40mg, and Febuxostat 40mg. The other half will be dosed in the reverse order.

The half of patients randomized to this cohort will be dosed in the order of Febuxostat 20mg, RDEA3170 10 mg + Febuxostat 20mg, RDEA3170 10 mg + Febuxostat 40mg, and Febuxostat 40mg. The other half will be dosed in the reverse order.

The half of patients randomized to this cohort will be dosed in the order of Benzbromarone 50 mg, Febuxostat 10mg+RDEA3170 2.5 mg, then Febuxostat 20mg+RDEA3170 5 mg. The other half will be dosed in the order of Febuxostat 10mg+RDEA3170 2.5 mg, Febuxostat 20mg+RDEA3170 5 mg, then Benzbromarone 50mg.
